file.name: issue1138.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Poly
  version: 1.0.0
paths: {}
components:
  schemas:
    Data:
      type: object
      required:
        - type
      properties:
        type:
          type: string
      discriminator:
        propertyName: type
        mapping:
          data_no_prop: "#/components/schemas/DataNoProp"
          data_prop: "#/components/schemas/DataProp"
    DataNoProp:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Data'
        - type: object
    DataProp:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Data'
        - type: object
          properties:
            prop:
              type: string
          required:
            - prop
